channel.title: Dragon hai robes
channel.description:
well i converted em i don't know if there well animated but you can do that if you want em bad enough i added animation also but i haven't tested. pics top [img]http://i384.photobucket.com/albums/oo289/averyallenkey/top.jpg[/img] bottom [img]http://i384.photobucket.com/albums/oo289/averyallenkey/bottom.jpg[/img] hat [img]http://i384.photobucket.com/albums/oo289/averyallenkey/hat.jpg[/img] dl link http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?3yyzq1tmxoh ill make some ints soon after i test but again im moving :P and also i didn't take pictures of the drops but there in there to. ints
if(i == 10000) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 8001; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 8000; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 8000; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dagon'hai hat"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A hat worn by members of the Dagon'hai.".getBytes(); // Item Examine } if(i == 10001) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 8003; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 8002; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 8002; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dagon'hai Robe Bottom"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A robe worn by members of the Dagon'hai.".getBytes(); // Item Examine } if(i == 10002) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 8005; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 8004; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 8004; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) and also the models come different with sleeves so i might have to redo it class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dagon'hai robe top"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A robe worn by members of the Dagon'hai.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
the ints are perfect if you need better ints ill make em

hat

if(i == 10000) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 8001;
